channel.title: One last question ever....-->
channel.description:
Sorry about double posting, but i really need someone to asnwer this.
Ok, so i know how to join networks on Hamachi
and in the grey box it comes up with HarryScape stuff (Which is what I'm trying to get on) It has a list of random stuff.
What do i do from here?

item.description:
@Happy-Scaper wrote:

Just use the Webclient…

item.dc:creator: @Unholy_Angel Unholy Angel
item.description:
@Unholy_Angel wrote:

Okay, go into MoparScape (Moparscape client or your Internet Browser) and type in the IP address and port for the server you wish to join.

item.dc:creator: @Aussstin Aussstin
item.description:
@Aussstin wrote:

I understand all that, well most of it but anyway.

well i double click on the IP with HarryScape next to it and the black box appears, so i just leave that sitting in the background, and do i have to use a certain client? I just don’t understand what to do once i get that black box up…

Read full topic

item.title: One last question ever....-->
item.dc:creator: @Aussstin Aussstin
item.description:
@Aussstin wrote:

It keeps saying request timed out

i still don’t quite get it D:[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 02:18:12 AM[/size][hr]Request timed out in the black box that pops up after i double click on one of the ips in the list on hamachi, with HarryScape next to it

Read full topic

item.title: One last question ever....-->
item.dc:creator: @Unholy_Angel Unholy Angel
item.description:
@Unholy_Angel wrote:

I assume your looking for a server posted on these forums?

Let’s say the server IP was “7.98.76.45” and Port: 43594.
and Hamachi: HarryScape2
and Hamachi Pass: 123

Go to “Join An Existing Server”.

Now, type in the name as “HarryScape2” and Password as “123”. Click join.

There should be a network list called “HarryScape2” with IP’s and Names for each server.

Look for the IP “7.98.76.45”, and the name next to it may seem familiar, if not, try it anyway. A black box should appear saying IP and Ping and stuff… let it be and click on MoparScape.

Finally, enter the port number: 43594 and Server IP, username and password. So Log-in!

I hope I understand your question, and you understood my answer.
-Unholy Angel

Read full topic
